item.title: Dot NET STIG Script
item.description: Automate the .NET Framework 4 STIG Applying the .NET STIG is definitely not straightforward. For many administrators it can take hours to fully implement on a single system. This script applies the required registry changes and modifies the machine.config file to implement FIPS and other controls as required. Work in Progress DO NOT APPLY IN PRODUCTION Notes: This script can not and will not ever get the .NET stig to 100% compliance.
